attributes.action: Deport Libyan soldiers claiming asylum in the UK, convicted of sexual assaults.
attributes.additional_details: All three men are now in secure immigration units after being released from prison, according to a Cambridgeshire Police spokesman.
attributes.background: Khaled El Azibi, Naji El Maarfi and Mohammed Abdalsalam carried out the attacks while stationed at Bassingbourn Barracks in Cambridgeshire last October.
